title: The Fireside Stories: Some Ghost Stories for Christmas Night
description: It's Christmas night.Put another log on the fire, and gather your family around the fireside. Turn down the lights so that the firelight glows on their faces and there's just enough light left for you to read by.Turn off the television and unplug the phone.Pour yourself a drink, if you like.Christmas is the time for ghosts, so turn the page and read to Those around you. The ghosts await you.............................
author: H.H. Benning
